1.title: I See You
1.plot: Today, Peekaboo hides behind all kinds of objects from a snowman and fence to a horse and a slide.

2.title: Where Are You?
2.plot: Watch with your baby and help him or her guess which object Peekaboo is hiding behind - whether it's a banana, an orange or a suitcase.

3.title: Hide & Seek
3.plot: Peekaboo is back for more fun and games! Watch and see him hide among objects such as a tree, a toy box and much more.

4.title: Surprise!
4.plot: Today, Peekaboo hides behind all kinds of objects from a panda and cloud to a house and a slide.

imdb.plot outline: The game of peek-a-boo has entertained babies and toddlers alike for years and years! In "Peekaboo, I See You!", the friendly blue fellow swings, rolls, bounces, summersaults and tiptoes into the hearts of little ones. Each episode features three objects and viewers get to guess which one he's hiding behind. The series is sure to result in giggles and surprises.
imdb.title: Peek-A-Boo, I See You!
plot: The game of peek-a-boo has entertained babies and toddlers alike for years and years! In "Peekaboo, I See You!", the friendly blue fellow swings, rolls, bounces, summersaults and tiptoes into the hearts of little ones. Each episode features three objects and viewers get to guess which one he's hiding behind. The series is sure to result in giggles and surprises.
